mean_cn: v.伪造，仿造；  n.仿制品，伪造物；  adj.仿造的，假冒的
mean_en: to make an exact copy of something in order to trick people into thinking that it is the real thing
sentence: She counterfeits a zebra by painting on a donkey.
sentence_trans: 她给驴子涂上颜色来冒充斑马。
word_etyma: counter相反 ＋ feit\u003ddo做 → 做（与真品）相反的 → counterfeit假冒的
